summary_prompt_template:
You are an analyst preparing short, neutral briefs on open-source projects.  Read the README below and write a **concise, 2- to 3-sentence summary** that:
• states the project’s core purpose / problem it solves
• lists its main capabilities or components (1–3 key points only)
• mentions the primary intended users or systems (e.g., smart-contract developers, node operators)
• notes any strongly signalled context such as supported programming language, network, or runtime

**Style constraints**
• Use plain, factual language in third person (no hype, no marketing adjectives).
• **Do not** guess or invent details that are not explicit in the README.
• **Do not** label the project with, or copy wording from, the taxonomy below (to avoid category leakage).
• Limit the summary to <100 words; avoid bullet lists or line breaks.

Return your answer as **exactly one valid JSON object** in this form (nothing extra):
{{
  "summary": "your summary here"
}}

README:
{readme_md}
